alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Arthur, southeastern Grant and west central McPherson Counties through 700 PM CDT/600 PM MDT/... At 627 PM CDT/527 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arthur, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Green Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Three Mile Lake, Flatts, Spring Valley Lake, Bucktail, Cogill Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 125 and 138. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
